main event: A bright white, circular UFO was observed hovering silently over Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, Canada for 10-15 minutes on September 13, 1962.
interesting points: The UFO was estimated to be 50-75 feet in diameter and at an altitude of 2,000-3,000 feet.
The UFO was observed to change directions without any apparent propulsion system.
The UFO's brightness would suddenly increase to the point of being almost painful to look at, and then dim back to its original brightness.
The sighting was made by multiple independent witnesses, and the object was also observed by at least one other person in a different location in Charlottetown.

A similar UFO was observed on December 3, 1962, described as a slightly glowing object the size of a small jet aircraft with a reddish-orange glow at the rear, which suddenly stopped, hovered, and then accelerated at a tremendous speed and disappeared.
